trans-unit.source: Manages the overflow behavior of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gere o comportamento de capacidade excedida de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the [ToolStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) to manage this situation.
trans-unit.target: Se existirem mais de capacidade excedida de itens que podem ser apresentados no formulário, utilize o [Editor de colecções de itens ToolStrip](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) para gerir esta situação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow"></xref> class derived from a base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow"> </xref> classe derivada de uma base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> from which to derive this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> partir do qual deriva esta <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objecto de acessibilidade do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se não chame o método CreateAccessibilityInstance explicitamente, este será chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade, tem de adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assemblagem instalada com o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets all of the items that are currently being displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todos os itens que atualmente estão a ser apresentados no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the DisplayedItems property to get everything the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> currently displays, including items the user did not add, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de DisplayedItems obter tudo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>apresenta atualmente, incluindo os itens que o utilizador não foi possível adicionar, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.Items%2A> property to get all items on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, including those not being displayed.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.Items%2A>propriedade obter todos os itens a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, incluindo os que não a ser apresentado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> that includes all items on this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"> </xref> que inclui todos os itens neste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual pode ser fitted um controlo.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: A área de tamanho personalizado para um controlo.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um par de do tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a largura e altura do retângulo de um.

trans-unit.source: Gets all of the items on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>, whether they are currently being displayed or not.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todos os itens <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>, se estes estão atualmente a ser ou não apresentados.

trans-unit.source: Use the Items property to get all items on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, including those not being displayed.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de itens para obter todos os itens no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, incluindo os que não a ser apresentado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.DisplayedItems%2A> property to get only those items that are currently displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.DisplayedItems%2A>propriedade para obter apenas os itens que estão atualmente apresentados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.DisplayedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> containing all of the items.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"> </xref> que contém todos os itens.

trans-unit.source: Passes a reference to the cached <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine*> returned by the layout engine interface.
trans-unit.target: Transmite uma referência para a cache <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine*>devolvido pela interface de motor de esquema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"></xref> that represents the cached layout engine returned by the layout engine interface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"> </xref> que representa o motor de esquema em cache devolvido pela interface de motor de esquema.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnLayout method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnLayout também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Resets the collection of displayed and overflow items after a layout is done.
trans-unit.target: Repõe a coleção de apresentada e overflow itens depois de terminar um esquema.
